video.title: Huntik
video.synopsis: A high school student searching for his missing father joins a secret group known as the Seekers, who ally with aliens to protect the world from evil.

episodes.synopsis: After he discovers his father's diary and an amulet, Lok and his classmate Sophie are chased by three strangers in suits who are after the journal.
episodes.title: A Seeker Is Born

episodes.synopsis: After Dante helps Lok escape agents who are after him, Sophie catches up to them. They discover that Lok's father was looking for the Amulet of Will.
episodes.title: The Casterwill Client

episodes.synopsis: While seeking the tomb of Jodis Lore in Prague, the gang meets the mysterious Zhalia, whom Sophie distrusts despite Zhalia's attempts to help them.
episodes.title: Words of Truth, Heart of Lies

episodes.synopsis: When the Huntik Foundation suspects a lost Titan is causing strange phenomena in France, the team heads to the Seine River so Dante can investigate.
episodes.title: Into the River of Secrets

episodes.synopsis: In Paris, the team finds notes and artifacts left by none other than Joan of Arc, and the clues guide them to hidden catacombs to find a magical ring.
episodes.title: Crawling the Catacombs

episodes.synopsis: Having found the cursed ring, the team has 30 minutes to exit the catacombs and get it to a Huntik specialist before the Organization nabs it.
episodes.title: Divide and Conquer

episodes.synopsis: The team heads to the temple of Thor in search of his legendary hammer, but find it's guarded by a small sect that the Organization has infiltrated.
episodes.title: The Legacy of Thor

episodes.synopsis: An Organization attack on the Huntik team yields truly unexpected results: a truce between Dante and Montahue, who partner up to find Thor's hammer.
episodes.title: Two Powers Become One

episodes.synopsis: Dante heads to Vienna seeking a cure for his ill mentor, Metz. As it turns out, clues in Lok's father's diary can also be unraveled in Vienna.
episodes.title: Absent Heroes

episodes.synopsis: As Dante's team searches for a legendary ship belonging to Greek hero Jason, they're trailed by DeFoe's spies, who are out to eliminate Dante.
episodes.title: The Treasures of the Argonauts

episodes.synopsis: On an ocean-bound mission to find the Argo titan, the team is forced to take a detour to a magical island that seems too good to be true.
episodes.title: The Beautiful Trap

episodes.synopsis: Grier's attempt to stop the war in his birthland leads to a conflict between him and the Huntik Foundation. Meanwhile, Lok faces the Lindorm Titan.
episodes.title: Like Father, Unlike Son

episodes.synopsis: The gang heads to Lok's native Ireland to visit his mother, who they learn worked at the Huntik Foundation. A friend soon shows up pursued by suits.
episodes.title: Home Turf

episodes.synopsis: Clues point Lok and the team to an amulet possibly hidden in the tomb of Nefertiti, but the Organization cuts off funds before they can reach Egypt.
episodes.title: All Work and No Pay

episodes.synopsis: At the tomb of Nefertiti, the team seeks the queen's powerful scepter, but Agents spring upon them as they try to decipher some hieroglyphics.
episodes.title: The Sceptre Deception

episodes.synopsis: Trailing Klaus to Vienna, the team closes in on his hideout rigged with traps. While there, Sophie begins to suspect there's a traitor among them.
episodes.title: The Bookshop Hunter

episodes.synopsis: With the Organization close behind, the gang races to find the titans of Vlad Dracul -- who, they learn, was not a really vampire but an evil Seeker.
episodes.title: The Vampire Loses Its Fangs

episodes.synopsis: The gang returns to Paris and tracks down the Sir Lancelot titan but ends up losing it. They find clues, however, that may lead them to Lok's father.
episodes.title: Memory Lane

episodes.synopsis: When the team heads to Turkey to find the legendary Titan Behemoth and are captured by the Amazonians, Sophie's Seeker powers save the day.
episodes.title: Ladies' Choice

episodes.synopsis: When Sophie uses her power to fix the journal, some long-missing information emerges that leads Lok and the team to the sunken city of Atlantis.
episodes.title: The Unseen Guide

episodes.synopsis: As Lok gets increasingly stronger, the Huntik team searches for the Amulet of Will and eventually finds Atlantis, where a series of tests awaits them.
episodes.title: Coming of Age

episodes.synopsis: Back home with the Amulet of Will, the Huntik team manages to translate a page of the journal and is soon headed on another mission -- to Ethiopia.
episodes.title: The Golden Asp

episodes.synopsis: Seeking another Titan in Ethiopia, the team must dodge the Professor as well as the Colossi and other traps. Zhalia creates a distraction to help out.
episodes.title: To Be Together

episodes.synopsis: While the team is in Austria with Metz, he recounts how he, Eathon Lambert and Simon Judeau searched for many titans together -- until Simon vanished.
episodes.title: The Secret of Two Generations

episodes.synopsis: Dante's team infiltrates the Professor's castle and must negotiate traps and other obstacles before getting hold of the titan Archwarder's amulet.
episodes.title: The Divine Comedy

episodes.synopsis: When the Professor tricks Dante into giving him the titans, Lok, Sophie and Cherit must stop the Professor from summoning the titan of immortality.
episodes.title: Mission

episodes.synopsis: Lok and the team travel to the South American waterfall where Eathon was last seen and discover both a new threat and a new source of clues.
episodes.title: Doorway to Huntik

episodes.synopsis: On a mission to rescue Peter at the Tower of Nostradamus, Lok and the team learn that the ancient prophet's scrying glass is the key to the Willblade.
episodes.title: The Tower of Nostradamus

episodes.synopsis: Lok and the team travel to England and fight unknown Seekers to enter the Crystal Cave, where they are given clues to the location of Avalon.
episodes.title: Cave of the Casterwills

episodes.synopsis: After activating the Dragon's Breath and creating a bridge to Avalon, Lok finds the Willblade and uses its Titan spirit Pendragon to fight Mr. Wilder.
episodes.title: Knight of the Willblade

episodes.synopsis: Sophie and Lok allow themselves to be captured by Mr. Wilder so they can discover the location of Void, the mysterious evil Titan.
episodes.title: Chasing Void

episodes.synopsis: Lok, Sophie and the team fight Mr. Wilder and the Organization to retrieve Void from Klaus's bookstore, but they are ambushed by the Blood Spiral.
episodes.title: The Blood Spiral

episodes.synopsis: Orphaned brothers Den and Harrison are recruited by Tantras, but Den befriends Zhalia and Vigilante, while his brother joins the Blood Spiral.
episodes.title: Den vs. Harrison

episodes.synopsis: The Huntik Foundation team tracks the Ring of Arc to catacombs under Notre Dame, where the ring casts a dreamlike spell on them.
episodes.title: The Legendary Titan of Fate

episodes.synopsis: Lok and the Huntik team race a Blood Spiral named Kiel to recover the Titan Medusa, a mission that nearly fails and forces Zhalia to adopt a new plan.
episodes.title: Zhalia's Mission

episodes.synopsis: Lok trains the inexperienced Den as Zhalia's replacement, while Zhalia trains with Tantras as the newest addition to the Blood Spiral.
episodes.title: Boys Will Be Seekers

episodes.synopsis: The Huntik team is dispatched to the Cloisters in New York, where they must contend with a stubborn Casterwill elder and a Blood Spiral attack.
episodes.title: The Casterwill Connection

episodes.synopsis: Ordered to activate the Blue Star, a signal to the remaining Casterwills, the team must solve a puzzle at the ancient Aztec capital of Teotihuacán.
episodes.title: The Titan in the Temple of Sun

episodes.synopsis: At a secret gathering of the remaining Casterwills, Sophie is assigned to find the legendary Mythras, Titan of Bravery, but the Blood Spiral attacks.
episodes.title: Sophie on Trial

episodes.synopsis: Sophie returns with Mythras, but the bickering Casterwills won't acknowledge her as leader, until a tragic sacrifice in battle ends the debate.
episodes.title: The Spiral War

episodes.synopsis: Dante tries to access the submerged treasure room of Cortez, while Sophie turns to the fable of the pied piper of Hamlin to clean up an infestation.
episodes.title: Gremlow Infestation!

episodes.synopsis: With the help of two Kumeyaay Seekers, the team accesses the treasure room of Cortez in search of Umbra, the legendary Titan of Dimensions.
episodes.title: The Power of Umbra

episodes.synopsis: At the castle of Vlad the Impaler, Lok leads his first mission to retrieve the Heart of Vlad, but it's almost his last when Tantras attacks.
episodes.title: Lok's Leadership

episodes.synopsis: Underneath a volcano island, the Huntik team descends into a labyrinth to destroy the anti-magic Loadstone and rescue Phoenix, the Titan of Rebirth.
episodes.title: The Dead Magic Island

episodes.synopsis: Unable to retrieve the Phoenix Amulet from the volcano and ambushed by the Blood Spiral, the Huntik team resorts to desperate measures.
episodes.title: The Phoenix's Ashes

episodes.synopsis: A battle erupts between the Huntik team and Mr. Wilder at the Professor's castle, where Lok hopes to find an access key and retrieve Rassimov's files.
episodes.title: An Ally from the Organization

episodes.synopsis: Using the Professor's files, the Huntik team captures Rassimov, but Harrison frees him and they escape with Tutankhamen's glass necklace.
episodes.title: Rassimov's Secret

episodes.synopsis: At the home of Lok's mother in Ireland, the team is drawn to the mythical floating city of Tír na nÓg, where Eathon instructs Lok in Willblade combat.
episodes.title: Back Home

episodes.synopsis: The final battle shapes up as Rassimov announces the Longest Night, and the team scrambles to unearth the last quatrain prophecy of Nostradamus.
episodes.title: Words from Eathon

episodes.synopsis: The attack on the Blood Spiral base seems to go in the team's favor, until the spectral presence of the Betrayer appears and reveals his evil plan.
episodes.title: The Spiral Mark

episodes.synopsis: The Betrayer returns to life and assails the Foundation and the Casterwill, but Zhalia admits she's a spy, inspiring Harrison to join her rebellion.
episodes.title: Lok and the Betrayer

episodes.synopsis: The team falters in its battle against the powerful Titan of Betrayal, Demigorgan, but a newly empowered Lok and a resurrected teammate turn the tide.
episodes.title: Dante's Return
